## Transport.isConnected() method

Returns true if the `state` equals "Connected".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isConnected(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

## Remarks

This is equivalent to `state === TransportState.Connected`<!-- -->.
